SELECT sync_redis_target.id AS id, sync_redis_target.mode AS mode, sync_redis_target.props AS props, sync_redis_target.target_id AS targetId, sync_redis_target.created_time AS createdTime, sync_redis_target.updated_time AS updatedTime, sync_target.name AS name, sync_target.remark AS remark, sync_target.env AS env, sync_target.type AS type FROM sync_redis_target inner join sync_target on sync_redis_target.target_id = sync_target.id WHERE 1 = 1
